detailed_results.question: How does payment processing work?
detailed_results.answer: Happy Payments uses a proprietary transaction engine built on a zero-trust architecture. Every payment is verified, encrypted with 256-bit end-to-end encryption, and monitored in real time. They also use advanced AI-driven fraud detection and continuous compliance audits.
